```{r import_posdata}
data(posdata)
con <- seatrackConnect(Username = "jens_astrom", Password = "jens_astrom")
dbGetQuery(con, "SET search_path = positions, public")

dbWriteTable(con, "positions.posdata", posdata, append = T)
```
